name: Felicia Performance Shorts – Night
description: Lightweight performance shorts with an all-over monogram pattern in purple on black. Designed for training, streetwear, and everyday comfort.

name: Felicia Performance Shorts – Ember
description: Statement red shorts with a gold monogram pattern for a bold, court-ready look.

name: Felicia Signature Hoodie – Crimson Grid
description: Crimson hoodie with repeating circular crest artwork, soft interior, and a relaxed, modern fit.

name: Felicia Signature Hoodie – Neon Grid
description: Black hoodie covered in a subtle neon grid pattern, perfect for late‑night sessions and city walks.

name: Felicia Court Hoodie – Triple Ball
description: Black court‑inspired hoodie with bold basketball line art wrapping across the chest and sleeves.

name: Felicia Drive Hoodie – Player Silhouette
description: Dynamic player silhouette and typographic artwork for those who stay hungry, humble, and hustle.

name: Felicia Court Hoodie – Hoop Sketch
description: White hoodie featuring sketched backboard artwork and Felicia court branding.

name: Felicia Snapback – White Court
description: Crisp white snapback with monochrome court illustration across the brim and front-panels typography.

name: Felicia Snapback – Player Silhouette
description: Black snapback featuring a driving player silhouette and bold typographic details.

name: Felicia Snapback – Court Motion
description: Black snapback with multiple basketball line art motifs and Hungry Humble Hustle tagline.
